data.approach: Investigating project sorting logic in /api/projects - sorting is by lastActivity from agent files, git commits, and server status. Need to understand why acme-saas ranks higher than flush despite having no tasks.

data.taskTitle: how are projects sorted in topbar>+new>select project
summary: Investigated project sorting logic in /api/projects endpoint
Sorting is by lastActivity (agent files, git commits, server status), NOT by task count
Demo project acme-saas is configured at non-existent path /tmp/squad-demo/acme-saas
flush has many tasks but lower lastActivity score than acme-saas

summary: Fixed session-start hook to only write agent files to current project (not all)
Added .beads/issues.jsonl mtime check to getLastActivity() for task activity
Fixed null score bug (999 -> 999999) so unknown projects sort to end
Cleaned up stale agent files from other projects

quality.preExisting: Sorting algorithm may have unintended behavior

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Clear Project Sorting Criteria in Project Selector
suggestedTasks.description: Develop a consistent project sorting mechanism for the topbar project dropdown. The current implementation appears to randomly order projects without clear logic. Implement a sorting strategy that considers factors like recent activity, task count, or alphabetical order. Investigate and modify the sorting function in the project selection component to create a predictable and user-friendly experience.
suggestedTasks.reason: Inconsistent project ordering reduces user experience and navigation efficiency

suggestedTasks.title: Document Project Sorting Logic and Requirements
suggestedTasks.description: Create clear documentation explaining the expected project sorting behavior. Outline the specific criteria for project ordering in the dropdown, including any business logic or user experience considerations. This documentation should serve as a reference for future development and clarify the expected sorting mechanism.
suggestedTasks.reason: Lack of clear sorting criteria needs formal documentation

gotchas: Current sorting appears to be non-deterministic

documentationNeeds: Update project selection dropdown behavior documentation
